projectSummary: This project automates GitHub workflows such as patch generation and issue management. The team recently restructured the component loading sequence to expose core Actions objects earlier, unblocking downstream automation features. Current work focuses on laying infrastructure groundwork for expanded capabilities.

commits.author: Copilot
commits.message: [WIP] Implement core global object shim for JavaScript files (#17353)
commits.before: JavaScript modules lacked global access to GitHub Actions core utilities.
commits.added: Global shim exposes GitHub Actions core object before module initialization.
commits.impact: Enables generate_git_patch and GitHub issue automation in downstream modules.
